entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
